attributes.action: Sack Sir Ian Blair forthwith & replace him with a directly elected Commissioner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ian Blair has demeaned the office of commissioner ever since taking up the post. His refuasl to fall on his sword for the fatal errors that have happened on his watch is unforgiveable.

He refused to listen to his senior officers advice and plead guilty to the charges for which they were found guilty on the 1st November 2007.

His alledged criticisms of his deputy in not taking up his bonus payment (which meant that he had to waive hs as-well) is unforgiveable.

The man has been a disaster and a travesty for londoners. it is about time that the office of commissioner was directly elected for by londoners!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
